Reviews.Title: “Great hotel”

Reviews.Content: stayed nights spotless stylishly decorated modern bathroom decent sized lights settings reviews commented buzzing yes slight noise settings excellent fun staff polite friendly eat hotel hotel value money definitely stay chain tiny gripe beds twins seen european hotels beds larger average

Reviews.Title: “A bit of a hidden gem”
Reviews.Author: jenx2468
Reviews.Content: stayed vincci arena april 2012 3 night break location hotel transport links 5 minutes walk metro aerobus commercial district reception staff friendly helpful 5th floor overlooking hotel road noise existant clean double beds 2 singles bolted aircon lighting adequate bathrooms clean functional overall accomodation boutique feel breakfasts wifi chargable extras breakfast food selection didnt try restaurant night overall hotel short break fabulous city

Reviews.Title: “Decent location, not too sure about cleanliness though..”
Reviews.Author: kenji8888
Reviews.Content: title location ok city view lol streets barcelona decent city view haha apart close airport underground transport cleanliness questioned found brownish red stains sheets immediate change granted swiftly im currently unsure recommend stay time im barcelona price paid cant complain

Reviews.Title: “Good location, limited facilities”
Reviews.Author: Beth P
Reviews.Content: hotel location touring barcelona hotel staff neither welcoming nor friendly hotel nicely decorated fair sized tv pay view except news channel poor hotel tea coffee facilities hairdryer bathroom drawer didnt food plenty locally especially lovely little bakery called pauls lovely pastries fine dont intend stay hotel

Reviews.Title: “Not bad for the price”
Reviews.Author: Shoppinginheels
Reviews.Content: friend booked twin vincci arena nights recently pictures looked hotel appeared central location reality considering sleeping showering cant complain twin beds pushed appearance double bed balcony actually patio door glass partition stop falling onto road below windows double glazed hear lot street noise guests walking corridors hotel apparently 4 star 3 star trying 4 star terms location wasnt central majority sights 5 min walk local metro station 10 mins la rambla sagrada familia depending line biggest dislike wifi complimentary outrageously expensive 4 star hotels stayed offer complimentary disappointed channels offered tv spanish tv channels english news constantly lost signal blockbuster movies offered 1200 eur excessive

Reviews.Title: “Perfectly satisfactory, if a bit unexciting”

Reviews.Content: stay nights vincci arena hotel whilst city break barcelona bedroom nice clean tidy beds singles pushed isnt taste breakfast buffet style meal food quality idea pot english breakfast tea thats expect american continental hotels hotel hundred metres barcelonas efficient inexpensive metro system route tourist buses perfectly satisfactory somewhat unexciting little sign life lobby wouldnt pick hotel romantic trip abroad business spend time city deal offered free wifi wasnt available mistake booking company hotel theres steep charge wifi connect free bedroom using cable supplied reception spa didnt try

Reviews.Title: “Depressingly dark decor and characterless”
Reviews.Author: JGNB
Reviews.Content: checkin gentleman desk broke couple times answer phone attend courier dropping deliveries reception desk straight front enter hotel tucked corner dark decor low lighting reception lounge unwelcoming impression corridors leading extremely dark mood created gloomy welcoming agree comments chipped surfaces bath indeed tiles walls bath cracked overall found clean wellmaintained hotel handy metro stations short walk tarragona espanya metro stations start journey tarragona involves lot walking underground espanya street noise especially mornings amount street noise expected city location didnt lunch dinner hotel cant comment quality meals breakfasts excellent wireless internet access extremely expensive considering costs hotels relatively little provide wireless internet service feels ripoff seek charge price paid reasonable considering hotels location overall impression lacked soul character gloomy

Reviews.Title: “Not as good as it looks in photos”
Reviews.Content: hi stayed hotel mid october 2 previous reviews photos looks eye fantastic bathrooms obviously lots leaks poor repair mildew tiles etc hotel uncomfortable hot appear air conditioning public breakfast fine location 5 minute walk underground station initial check receptionist unfriendly created bad impression start paid £80 night bed breakfast cheap barcelona opinion worth

Reviews.Title: “decor looks good in photos but poor workmanship ruined it.”
Reviews.Author: MrandMrs_10
Reviews.Content: stayed 2 nights coz botique style hotel hotel definitly looked photos arrived actual mould cornor tiles unevenly aligned uneven white bathtube permanent black mark dirt washable dont bath theres bathtube shower power shower head pressure air con hotel lobby corridor doesnt feel welcoming october mid week hotel feels empty location arena shopping mall collection shops restaurant cafe stop a1 airport bus 5 minutes walk

Reviews.Title: “Modern, clean hotel near the Magic Fountain”

Reviews.Content: booked tripadvisor buy nights stay deal clean modern hotel lobby nice hotel 7 minute walk metro station staff spoke english helpful internet expensive computer lobby bit noisy night bother beach trip hotel barceloneta

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay”

Reviews.Content: wife wedding anniversary visit barcelona mid 2011 reception staff pretty indifferent modern dark furniture little scratched worn quiet bit expensive wifi fees annoyance overall rating 3 star 4 star reception staff trained customer service friendly smile start

Reviews.Title: “A great place to stay whilst on visit to Barcelona.”

Reviews.Content: hotel situated touristy espana location hotel brilliant easy metro 5 minute walk arena worth vist views 5 minute walk hotel hotel quiet extremely clean size bed little hard bathroom size decorated trendy little nosy hotel corner roads restaurant looked busy lovely traditional spanish food definitely tapas option cheeky cava cheap

Reviews.Title: “Loved this hotel, already recommended it to other friends”
Reviews.Author: jjng
Reviews.Content: stayed vincci arena barcelona nights september 2010 absolute steal paid 160night received gorgeous suite top floor issue difficult situated street arrived late barcelonas airport train city hotel close barcelona sants main train station wrong exit directed wrong direction locals fault able read maps correctly barcelona addresses deceiving ie 24 reception bit frosty describe concierge friendly checked quickly directed nearby convenience store restaurants closed time arrived hotel trendy dark decor stepped suite impressed size decor vast array amenities included separate closets bath separate toilet chaise desk complicated lighting options mood lighting romantic bright private balcony jacuzzi unfortunately broken filled cold water despite call fix impressed unfortunately appear forgotten photos usually setting luggage hotel central city sights 10minute walking distance nearest metro station close indoor food market luxury price recommend hotel friends

Reviews.Title: “Very Impressed - Highly Recommendable”
Reviews.Author: alloverman
Reviews.Content: spent nights april location perfect hustle catalonia heading arena night nice break plaça espanya 5 minute walk train stops happens hotel trendy boutique hey goes spain spend day spotlessly clean bathrooms couldnt anymore money spent didnt breakfast hotel coffee shops stop morning experience country downside free wifi comes handy travelling

Reviews.Title: “One of the best rooms I've slept in”
